short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your new tab page with a beautiful manga image -- discover new manga.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dashboard Spread replaces your new tab page with a new, beautiful manga spread every day. Be inspired and uplifted by some of the best art manga has to offer, or discover new, strikingly beautiful manga through Dashboard Spread. Deepen your excitement and knowledge of manga today!
